channel.title: The new datmaker and texture support
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I'm Edvinas from R-S (sorry if I'm not allowed to post the name of forum here, tell me and I'll remove). I love how this community is contributing towards the client related stuff such as modeling, unlike R-S where people only want to make "100% runescape" or "old runescape" lol.
Anyways, I've heard that MrpotatoeHead is making a new datmaker, and that he will add support for model textures?
The question is generally towards MrpotatoeHead, so I suggest you don't start spamming unless you know the answer as well ^^
How is it going with the datmaker, well more of how is it going with the texture support? Any teasers on when we could expect you to release a beta?
I'm really looking forward to it. RSPS modeling would get a whole new meaning, and would give me and other modelers lots to do replacing runescape's crappy models with good-looking textured ones.
Thanks
EDIT: lol why do you filter R-S? They don't filter moparscape.. :D

item.title: The new datmaker and texture support
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Why didn’t you just personal message him ?
And as far as I know, it’s going well, don’t think he’s had any problems that haven’t been already overcome yet.

Read full topic
item.source: The new datmaker and texture support

item.title: The new datmaker and texture support
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Uuh… Learn to read board titles, know that others really don’t care about the new datmaker, and not make a personal message as a public announcement.

Read full topic
item.source: The new datmaker and texture support

Hello guys,
